title: Unable to log in
body: i was randomely disconnected as the store went down and now cannot log in  i just get stuck at authenticating

replies.body:
Interesting... Can you quickly try using a VPN such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) when logging into the client? This will cause your connection to take a different route to the server and will help determine pretty quickly if this is a local connection or route issue.

Let me know the results!
Targons Blade, I've been having a bit of trouble as well login in to League, there is a post on my board about the problem if you could help me out.
